snippet.title: "Puzzle Battler! Mirai" debut trailer on STEAM
snippet.description:
Visit STEAM store!  https://store.steampowered.com/app/1213910/
"Puzzle Battler! Mirai" is a fun 4-match Puzzle RPG with a variety of skills to attack and defend.
Chain the puzzle pieces to defeat the enemies, get funny skills and challenge the bosses!
